```bash

# Backend (Railway) 
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://...
SESSION_SECRET_KEY=your-secret-key
ALLOWED_ORIGINS=["https://tranquil-frangipane-ceffd4.netlify.app"]
ENV=production
```
